titleStmt.title: The saints submission and Sathans overthrow. Or, Sermons on James 4.7. By that faithfull and reverend divine, Iohn Preston, Doctor in divinitie, Chaplaine in ordinarie to his Majestie, Master of Emmanuel Colledge, sometime preacher of Lincolnes-Inne
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. D[awson] and are to be sold by Peter Cole at the signe of the Glove in Cornhill, neere the Royal-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Portrait of author on verso of A1, opposite title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Glove in Cornhill, neere the Royal-Exchange
